description:
口语考试往往侧重考察学生对语言的应用能力，这对于一些学生而言，并不是太难。但是考虑到之前口语练习较少，不少学生还是会在今天倍感压力。不过口语考试并不是什么洪水猛兽，只要稍加练习，做到有话可说，就不会在考场上出现尴尬的场面。

Pair work （小组讨论）这一部分，准备时间为1分钟，考生需要在三分钟内围绕着健康展开，这一部分的呈现上尽量做到流利不重复，且内容完整。那么接下来，我们来看一下就健康这一主题展开的一些常用的表述：

小组讨论：1.  rational diet

          2.  sufficient rest and proper exercise

          3.  optimistic attitude

A: Hello! good health is more important than wealth and it has been the most heated topic among us. I’ve heard a lot of news about problems of health. How do you think of health?

B:  Health is quite important, and without it, we can’t achieve anything. As for me, keeping health will be an easy but difficult thing. Do you have any suggestions about keeping health?

A:  Yes, in order to keep health both in physical and mental parts, rational diet is necessary. Some people always have little food to lose weight, which is harmful for their health. What’s more, I also believe that sufficient rest and proper exercise can support our daily activities.

B:  Yeah, sufficient rest, especially the enough rest and sleep, will make us energetic. I also like taking some exercise to keep a better appearance and health. 

A:  Taking exercise and having sufficient rest can be good ways, in my mind, we also need to learn some effective measures to keep a good mood.

B:  Yes, I can’t agree more. Have a good mood or optimistic attitude can lead us to higher efficiency. While, bad mood can make us passive and do things with reluctance.

A:  So, we need to keep health. Without it, we will fail to make achievement. Let’s us take some effective measures. Would you like to play basketball with me?

B:  OK, let’s go.

以上，就是小编为各位考生带来的大学英语四级口语考试的小组对话，希望能够对各位考生有所助益。祝各位都可以取得令人满意的成绩。
